solution_line_template: The total capacity of the {num_chairs} chairs was {num_chairs}*{capacity_per_chair}=<<{num_chairs}*{capacity_per_chair}={total_capacity}>>{total_capacity} people.

If {unoccupied_fraction} of the chairs were unoccupied, {unoccupied_fraction}*{total_capacity}=<<{unoccupied_fraction}*{total_capacity}={people_missed_meeting}>>{people_missed_meeting} people missed the board meeting since the number of members was the same as the chair's capacity.
The number of board members who attended the meeting was {total_capacity}-{people_missed_meeting}=<<{total_capacity}-{people_missed_meeting}={attended_members}>>{attended_members}
